system.description:
A javelin made of a deep sea dragon tooth, or perhaps the bone is mined from those caves that have titanic skeletons?

Effect: Your ranged attacks have -2 to their maximum range, but they gain +1 Attack Tooth.

Naga Set (1/4): You become a Naga Knight: gain Bravery +2 while youâ€™re Flanked by enemies.
